title: Samson / Lunge Stretch
description: Begin by standing tall with a tight core and looking straight ahead. Keep your chest up as you step forward with your right foot into a lunge position. Lower the left knee to the ground. Extend the right knee forward. Clasp your hands together and push them straight overhead. Youâ€™ll primarily feel the stretch in your hamstrings and hip flexors. Hold for 20 to 30 seconds then switch sides.
